- miHoYo has updated the Russian localization for Genshin Impact in version 6.5, addressing previous translation issues.
- The changes aim to enhance player experience by making the dialogue and text more culturally relevant and contextually accurate.
- The company acknowledges feedback from the community, indicating a commitment to improving localization based on player input.
- This update reflects a broader trend in the gaming industry to prioritize quality localization to cater to diverse audiences.

Source: https://news.google.
